T02D3032:74a-0: @74a * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3032:74a-1: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3032:74b-0: @74b snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la stong phrag
T02D3032:74b-1: lnga bzlas nas bye ma la bzlas nas rgyal po'i
T02D3032:74b-3: rgyal po'i chad pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3032:74b-4: me'i 'jigs pa zhi bar 'dod na shing gcig gi drung du song ste /
T02D3032:74b-5: mandal dang mchod pa rdzogs par byas la snying po rgyas bsdus la snga ma ltar bzlas nas /
T02D3032:74b-6: ske tshe la bzlas nas me la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3032:74b-7: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa la se byi'i sha phye
T02D3032:74b-8: mar btags pa la bzlas te phog par gtor na
T02D3032:74b-10: gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams la stag gi spu la bzlas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3032:74b-11: mkha' 'gro mas 'jigs na ce spyang gi khrag dang
T02D3032:74b-12: spu bsres nas bdag gi lus mgo mjug tu byugs
T02D3032:74b-15: mu zi dang gla rtsi la bzlas nas mgul du btags na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3032:74b-16: dug gis 'jigs na rma bya'i mkhris pa dang bu khye'u'i ro tshon dang /
T02D3032:74b-17: spal pa bse ru'i sha la bzlas nas lto stong
T02D3032:74b-18: la zos na de'i 'og tu rang gi dri chu
T02D3032:74b-20: 'jigs pa brgyad las thar ba'i sgrub pa sbas pa'i ga'u zhes bya ba /
